dynamic_elements.text: The roots of Rock 'n' Roll have been hotly discussed by music analysts and historians. There is widespread consensus that it emerged in the Southern United States - an area that produced the majority of the big early rock 'n' roll artists - through the convergence of numerous influences that embodied a fusion of African musical tradition and European equipment. Because of the migration of many former slaves and their descendants to major urban centers such as St. Louis, Memphis, New York City, Detroit, Chicago, Cleveland, and Buffalo, black and white residents were living in closer proximity than ever before, hearing each other's music and even beginning to emulate each other's fashions. This process of "cultural collision" was facilitated by radio stations that made white and black forms of music available to both populations, the development and distribution of the vinyl record, and African-American musical styles such as jazz and swing that were adopted by white performers.

dynamic_elements.table_query:
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX bd: <http://www.bigdata.com/rdf#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
 
SELECT DISTINCT ?human ?humanLabel ?pic
WHERE
{
	VALUES ?professions {wd:Q177220 wd:Q639669}
	?human wdt:P31 wd:Q5 .
	?human wdt:P106 ?professions .
  ?human wdt:P18 ?pic .
	?human wdt:P136 ?genre .
	?human wikibase:statements ?statementcount .
	?genre rdfs:label ?genreLabel . 
	FILTER CONTAINS(?genreLabel, "rock") .
	FILTER (?statementcount > 50 ) .
    FILTER regex(str(?pic), "jpg").

	SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }
}
ORDER BY DESC(?sitelinks)
LIMIT 5

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX bd: <http://www.bigdata.com/rdf#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
 
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count)
WHERE {
 	?item wdt:P31 wd:Q482994 . # album
{?item wdt:P136 wd:Q11399 .} #genre
UNION {?item wdt:P136 wd:Q7749 .}
 ?item wdt:P577 ?date . #publication date
 
 SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".	
  	}
   BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?date)) AS ?label)
}
 
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY ?label
LIMIT 20

dynamic_elements.count_label: Rock artists and bands around the world

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Subgenres of rock music in Italy
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX bd: <http://www.bigdata.com/rdf#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
 
SELECT DISTINCT ?label
WHERE {
  ?band wdt:P31 wd:Q215380 .
  ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q38 .
  ?band wdt:P136 ?genre .
  
  ?genre wdt:P279 wd:Q11399.
  ?genre rdfs:label ?label .
 FILTER(LANG(?label) = "en") # Filter by English language label
 SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }
}
LIMIT 10
